row.title: Thyroid Cancer Risk Assessment Tool
row.field_page_description: The R package thyroid implements a risk prediction model developed by NCI researchers to calculate the absolute risk of developing a second primary thyroid cancer (SPTC) in individuals who were diagnosed with a cancer during their childhood.
